title: AI Show - Azure Cognitive Search
description:
Show how organizations do more with their data using the and AI capabilities of Azure Cognitive Search. I'll show how they can take data from databases and files and easily mine it for additional knowledge, allowing them to better explore and understand their information.

Learn More:
What is Azure Cognitive Search: https://aka.ms/WhatIsCognitiveSearch
